title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Tissue Capacity
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Rebuild aerobic base, tendon/ligament capacity and movement quality.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Strength (full): Back Squat 4x6 @RPE6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg
Hangboard easy repeaters: 6x7'' on/3'' off x3 grips

notes: Week 1: Z2 2x40–50'. Week 2: +10% volume; controlled eccentrics 3–4s on key lifts.
